experiences.title: Postdoctoral Researcher
experiences.subtitle: University of Texas Southwestern
workDescription: Designed a deep learning-based MRI preprocessing framework using variance stabilization for non-stationary Rician noise.
Leveraged diffusion models for high-fidelity MRI denoising and visual quality enhancement.

experiences.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experiences.subtitle: West Virginia University
workDescription: Conducted data collection experiments and data labeling for AI model development.
Developed machine learning pipelines for healthcare and advanced manufacturing applications.
Published research in peer-reviewed journals and contributed to NSF grant proposal writing (Grant No. 2119654).

experiences.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
experiences.subtitle: West Virginia University
workDescription: Assisted in preparing class materials and graded exams and assignments.

experiences.title: Executive Industrial Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Esquire Knit Composite Ltd.
workDescription: Implemented modular sewing line layouts using Lean Manufacturing principles, improving production efficiency by 15%.
Optimized capacity and line balancing to reduce idle time, saving approximately $30,000 annually in operational costs.
